Package fko.tetris.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bag
    This class holds each of the 7 Tetriminos once.
    HighScoreData
    Reads and stores the highscore from and to file
    HighScoreData.HighScoreEntry
    A entry in the Highscore list.
    Matrix
    This represent the internal playfield which basically consists of a background matrices of 10 columns and 40 rows and a current Tetrimino.
    NextQueue
    Simple FIFO Queue which is always back-filled with elements from a given Bag.
    TetrisGame
    This represents the state of a Tetris game.
    TetrisSettings
    Properties class for Tetris.
    TetrisSounds
    This is an example program that demonstrates how to play back an audio file using the Clip in Java Sound API.
    TetrisTimer
    This class implements a timer which can be set for an arbitrary time.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TetrisColor
    Represents the 7 different Tetris colors
    TetrisControlEvents  
    TetrisPhase
    All states a tetris engine can be in
    TetrisSounds.Clips
    All available audio clips of this class
